content.question:
Aluminum metal can be recycled from scrap metal by melting the metal to evaporate impurities.

Calculate the amount of heat needed to purify 1.00 mole of Al originally at 298 K by melting it. The melting point of Al is 933 K. The molar heat capacity of Al is 24 J/(mol⋅K), and the heat of fusion of Al is 10.7 kJ/mol.

The equation for the overall process of extracting Al from Al2O3 is shown below. Which requires less energy, recycling existing Al or extracting Al from Al2O3? Justify your answer with a calculation.
